title: Miniature Portrait of Elizabeth Lady Milbank
medium: watercolor on card or vellum; gold metal frame
provenance_text:
Mrs. Lewis, London. F. T. Read, 1889 [1]. E. M. Hodgkins, New York, NY, March 21, 1916; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, March 21, 1916; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] This work was exhibited at the Burlington Fine Arts Exhibition in 1889 as number 45 in case XXVII, where it was noted as being lent from F. T. Read.
